text: Lend a Paw is an animated short movie. It was produced in Technicolor by Walt Disney Productions. It was distributed by RKO Radio Pictures. It was released on October 3, 1941. Lend a Paw was directed by Clyde Geronimi. Leigh Harline wrote the music. George Nicholas, Kenneth Muse, Nick Nichols, William Sturm, Eric Gurney, Norman Tate, Chick Otterstrom, Morey Reden, and Emery Hawkins animated the movie. The voice cast includes Walt Disney as Mickey and Pinto Colvig as Pluto."Lend A Paw ". www.bcdb.com It was the 115th short in the Mickey Mouse film series to be released, and the sixth for that year. ==Voice cast== * Mickey Mouse: Walt Disney * Pluto, Pluto's angel and Pluto's devil: Pinto Colvig * Kitten: June Foray ==Releases== * 1941 - theatrical release * 1954 - Disneyland, episode #1.6: "A Story of Dogs" (TV) * c. 1972 - The Mouse Factory, episode #29: "Consciences" (TV) * c. 1992 - Mickey's Mouse Tracks, episode #67 (TV) * c. 1992 - Donald's Quack Attack, episode #15 (TV) * 1993 - The Adventures of Mickey and Donald, episode #1 (TV) ==Home media== The short was released on December 7, 2004 on Walt Disney Treasures: The Complete Pluto: 1930-1947. Additional releases include: * 1981 - "Mickey Mouse and Donald Duck Cartoon Collections Volume Three" (VHS) * 1998 - "The Spirit of Mickey" (VHS) * c. 2002 - Bonus on Oliver and Company (DVD/VHS, only in USA/Canada) * 2005 - "Classic Cartoon Favorites: Holiday Celebration with Mickey and Pals" (DVD) * 2006 - Bonus on The Fox and the Hound (25th anniversary edition DVD) * 2009 - Bonus on Oliver and Company (20th anniversary edition DVD) * 2013 - Bonus on Oliver and Company (25th anniversary edition Blu-ray) ==References== ==Other websites== * * Category:Disney animated movies Category:Short movies Category:Movies directed by Clyde Geronimi Category:Movies composed by Leigh Harline
title: Lend a Paw
